casebody.data:
IRVING TRUST COMPANY, as Trustee In Bankruptcy of Leonard H. Smith, Trading as Faultless Sweater Mills, Bankrupt, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Morris SCHOENTHAL and Fannie R. Schoenthal, Defendants-Appellants, and Hyman Smith, Defendant. No. 101. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Jan. 4, 1932. Martin Perlmutter, of New York City (Leo Guzik, of New York City, of counsel), for appellants. Krause & Hirseh, of New York City (George C. Levin, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, L. CHASE, Circuit Judges. HAND, and

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
